encodingDesc.p: This file encoded to comply with EpiDoc Guidelines and Schema version 8 http://www.stoa.org/epidoc/gl/5/

revisionDesc.change: Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - L.32 underdot below ϙ; L. 51-54, 74-91, 124-126: (μ(υριάς)) -> (μ(υριάδες)), L.72: <#ϙ=40#> -> <#ϙ=90#>; L.89; L. 93: ἕξ gravis add markup for numbers, |reg|; L.101, 103 adjust fractions, L.109,114 ((ὄβολος?)) underdot instead of ?; Frg.c.1.1. del. η.

Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - L.32 underdot below ϙ; L. 51-54, 74-91, 124-126: (μ(υριάς)) -> (μ(υριάδες)), L.72: <#ϙ=40#> -> <#ϙ=90#>; L.89; L. 93: ἕξ gravis add markup for numbers, |reg|; L.101, 103 adjust fractions, L.109,114 ((ὄβολος?)) underdot instead of ?; Frg.c.1.1. del. η.

Submit - Added text and metadata of TM 63929 according to PRainUnterricht 152 within the scope of an exercise for the course 'Griechische Quellen zum antiken Unterricht' at the university of Würzburg. I could not find a way to have the symbols of the different oboloi amounts displayed on papyri.info, so I just indicated abbreviation for the written value (cf. r, fr. c, coll.1-2).
